1.1.name: wordpress/videosurf-video-link-enhancer
1.1.description: Turn video links in your posts and comments into playable inline videos, right in your blog! With the VideoSurf Video Link Enhancer, when your readers hover their mouse over links to videos, an in-line player appears that allows them to watch the linked video without having to leave your page. Videos from hundreds of sites are supported, including Hulu, Youtube, Metacafe, Dailymotion, Comedy Central, Yahoo! Video, Google Video, Fancast, and many, many more.
